text: Yahudi aur Isayi tumse hargiz raazi na honge, jab tak tum unke tareeqe par na chalne lago. Saaf kehdo ke raasta bas wahi hai jo Allah ne bataya hai, warna agar us ilm ke baad jo tumhare paas aa chuka hai tumne unki khwahishaat ki pairwi ki to Allah ki pakad se bachane wala koi dost aur madadgaar tumhare liye nahin hai
